summary: Iteration 41 - Verified all 10 frontend changes for mobile parity and accessibility. All tests PASSED.
critical_code_review_comments: PASS (Test 1): NARVO text visible in mobile header at 375px - confirmed via Playwright, no 'hidden sm:block' class
PASS (Test 2): PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS toggle REMOVED from /system page - data-testid='toggle-push-notifications' not found
PASS (Test 3): BROADCAST_LANGUAGE section REMOVED from /system page - no 'broadcast-lang-*' elements on SystemSettingsPage
PASS (Test 4): BROADCAST_LANGUAGE cards ADDED to /voices page - 5 cards found (en, pcm, yo, ha, ig) with data-testid='broadcast-lang-{code}'
PASS (Test 5): Voice selector dropdown REMOVED from /briefing page - data-testid='voice-selector' not found
PASS (Test 6): Mobile ARTICLE_METADATA section EXISTS on /news/{id} - collapsible via data-testid='mobile-metadata-toggle', content visible
PASS (Test 7): No horizontal overflow on /account page at 375px - scrollWidth=375, clientWidth=375
PASS (Test 8): No horizontal overflow on /system page at 375px - scrollWidth=375, clientWidth=375
PASS (Test 9): Skip-link exists in DOM with class='skip-link' linking to #main-content
PASS (Test 10): :focus-visible CSS rule found in stylesheet for accessibility keyboard navigation
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click '[Oya, Play]' on landing page
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 41 verified all mobile parity and accessibility changes: 1) DashboardHeader.js line 24 - NARVO text always visible (no hidden class). 2) SystemSettingsPage.js - push_notifications toggle and broadcast_language section removed. 3) VoiceStudioPage.js lines 230-279 - BROADCAST_LANGUAGE cards added with 5 language options. 4) MorningBriefingPage.js - voice-selector dropdown removed. 5) NewsDetailPage.js lines 14-119 - MobileMetadata collapsible component added with data-testid='mobile-article-metadata'. 6) AccountPage.js/SystemSettingsPage.js - overflow-x-hidden added, no mobile overflow. 7) index.css lines 97-139 - accessibility CSS: skip-link, :focus-visible rules, reduced-motion support. 8) App.js line 69 - skip-link anchor added. 9) DashboardLayout.js line 41 - id='main-content' added to outlet wrapper.

narvo_text_mobile_header.notes: NARVO text visible in header at 375px mobile viewport. Class no longer includes 'hidden sm:block'.

push_notifications_removed.notes: toggle-push-notifications element not found on /system page

broadcast_language_removed_from_system.notes: No broadcast-lang-* elements found on /system page

broadcast_language_added_to_voices.notes: 5 broadcast language cards found (en, pcm, yo, ha, ig) with proper data-testid attributes

voice_selector_removed_briefing.notes: voice-selector dropdown not found on /briefing page

mobile_article_metadata.notes: mobile-article-metadata section found on mobile news detail page with collapsible toggle

account_page_overflow.notes: No horizontal overflow at 375px mobile viewport

system_page_overflow.notes: No horizontal overflow at 375px mobile viewport

skip_link_accessibility.notes: Skip-link found in DOM with href='#main-content', #main-content element exists

focus_visible_css.notes: :focus-visible CSS rule found in stylesheet for keyboard accessibility
